Name: Norilsk
About the game: After being abroad for 12 years Iosif returns to his home. Having spent most of his life going from place to place Iosif is excited by the prospect of being able to set down some roots. Iosif goes to a local university to complete his education. There he meets an old friend, named Lesya, who is eager to reconnect their friendship. Will Iosif choose to rekindle an old flame or will he find another fire burning in an unexpected place? This visual novel will have a common route followed by 4 different choices the main character can make. Each choice will effect who Iosif ends up with at the end of the novel. To get all the content for this game, please download the free DLC on this page.
